body: You grew up on the streets of a large city, and as a result you have developed a knack for picking pockets and hiding small objects on your person. You gain a +1 trait bonus on Sleight of Hand checks, and Sleight of Hand is always a class skill for you.
name: Child of the Streets
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Traits/Basic Traits/Social Traits/Child of the Streets
